name: Iver_Space_Game_Jam
description:
This is my submission to the A fox in space game jam.

The Objective is to crash into as many enemy ships you can

Controls:

mouse to aim

left mouse button (hold) to charge up engine. let go to shoot forward

right mouse button to brake most of your speed.

Programming and art: Iver (me)

Music and sound: Lobster

Voice Acting: Jongamebeer
